snippet: Edward I. Koch, 87, had been “extraordinarily weak” in recent weeks and was barely eating, a friend said.
lead_paragraph: Edward I. Koch, 87, had been “extraordinarily weak” in recent weeks and was barely eating, a friend said.

headline.seo: Edward Koch, Former Mayor, Is Hospitalized for Anemia
headline.main: Former Mayor Koch Is Hospitalized for Anemia
headline.print_headline: Former Mayor Koch Is Hospitalized for Anemia
